name: AcyMailing integration for Advanced Custom Fields (ACF)
author: AcyMailing Newsletter Team

sections.description:
Requirements

AcyMailing
Advanced Custom Fields

Insert custom posts from Advanced Custom Fields in your emails.
Automatically generate monthly newsletters including the last posts.

Features :

  • Adds a new droppable button in the editor to insert custom posts in your emails
  • Display custom posts in the email effortlessly
  • Select the data you want to display (pictures, title, description, link, etc…)
  • Customize the way the posts are shown in the plugin settings
sections.installation:
1. In your Admin click on Plugins then “Add New Plugin”
  2. Search for Advanced Custom Fields AcyMailing
  3. Find it, install it, enable it
  4. You’re done!
sections.faq:
How to contact us?

Feel free to do it via this form: https://www.acymailing.com/contact/

Where can I find a documentation?

You can find the complete documentation here: https://docs.acymailing.com/addons/wordpress-add-ons/acf
sections.changelog:
1.0 – June 24, 2024

  • Initial release

See the whole changelog here.
